li.label: crafted with bones
li.description: There's something deeply satisfying about working with bones. The way they respond to the touch, the patterns they reveal... it feels right.

li.label: magnificent beard
li.description: My beard is a work of art, a testament to generations of grooming mastery. I can feel the ancestral spirits dancing in its spirals.

li.label: spirit guidance
li.description: The ancestral spirits have spoken to me, sharing their ancient wisdom. I feel connected to something greater than myself.

li.label: bone whispers
li.description: The bones have shared their secrets with me. I understand things now that I never did before.

li.label: commanded respect
li.description: Others fear me, and that fear is a form of respect. They know I am dangerous, and that knowledge serves me well.

li.label: successful ritual
li.description: The ritual was performed perfectly. I can feel the spiritual energy flowing through me, connecting me to the ancient ways.

li.label: Ate human meat during ritual
li.description: You consumed the sacred flesh in the presence of the altar. The spirits approve.

li.label: cursed by the spiral
li.description: The Zhul have cursed me. I can feel their malevolent spirits whispering in the shadows, promising terrible retribution.

li.label: neglected grooming
li.description: I haven't properly maintained my beard. The spirits must be disappointed in my lack of devotion to the old ways.

li.label: bone hunger
li.description: I crave the satisfaction of working with bones. My hands ache to carve, to shape, to create beauty from the remains of the dead.

li.label: spirits gone silent
li.description: The ancestral spirits have stopped speaking to me. Their silence is deafening, and I fear I have somehow failed them.

li.label: envious of beard
li.description: Their beard is magnificent, far superior to my own. I can't help but feel envious of their grooming mastery.

li.label: shared sacred ritual
li.description: We performed the ritual together, sharing in the ancient traditions. There's a bond between us now that goes beyond mere friendship.

li.label: shared the feast
li.description: We partook in the sacred feast together, consuming the flesh of our enemies. This shared experience creates a bond deeper than blood.

li.label: bloodlust mastery
li.description: Having slain 100 humanlike foes, this pawn exudes legendary bloodlust and radiates primal power.

li.label: Cannibalistic Urges
li.description: This pawn is tormented by cravings for humanlike flesh.
